remarks: The sum of two cardinal numbers is their maximum, if one of them is infinite.  Proposition 10.41 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 95.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Apr-2015.)
statement: infcda $p |- ( ( A e. dom card /\ B e. dom card /\ _om ~<_ A ) -> ( A +c B ) ~~ ( A u. B ) ) $.
